content: Brilliant. I had no idea there would be so many options, settings and tweaks available for my Mustang III. Just unbelievably useful. Thanks and kudos to the developer.
Excellent app, makes using the Fender mustang V much easier than the fender tone app.

Round of applause and thank you to the developer üëçüëç. The ability to manipulate mids, and presence are paramount to small amplifiers of any type, be it digital, analogue or tube. And the sag and bias are superb.. I picked up a mustang 1 v2 on a whim and was pretty impressed, but like many guitarist, programmers, and muscle car builders I wondered, how far can this amp be pushed for Max tone?? So I put 2" ports on the opposite side of plug in back towards the edge, improved the tone as well..

Great app. I dusted off my mustang 1 v2 to play around with on my computer only to find out that it's no longer supported by Fender. WTFFFFFF. In comes this app and totally saves the day! I actually prefer this over the windows program!

I was afraid that after the Fuse application was discontinued the deeper features of my amp would be forever unavailable. This is not only a solution to that problem, but a dramatic improvement over what was previously available. This is a job very well done.
It works. More advanced than I need as a beginner. Fast support.
Tried 4 different OTG adapters and 4 different phones (inc Samsung S8 plus and S6 Tab) and no luck connecting
replyContent: Hi. If you can provide me with your Google Play Store Order ID I can get you a quick refund. Please send it via email to : support@tritonsw.com Regards. Robert

content: Outstanding app. I was questioning my choice of practice amp when I took it home and started to play with it , but this app really unlocks the hidden potential inside this thing. Plenty of great presets to keep me amused for a good long time . App seems plenty stable on a pixel 4XL. If you haven't heard it enough, thank you for making this for the community. Money well spent.
replyContent: You are welcome. It's a labor of love.

content: You my need to update your firmware but I was supported, even though Fender does not. Thank you for supporting a much needed product. Regards, Derek
Unlocks the hidden potential within my Mustang. Totally blown away. This app is amazing!

This app is terrible do not believe the discription in all honesty it shouldnt be allowed to be sold because of its false claim plus its not honored by the refund policy dont waste your hard earned money
replyContent: Matt. If you provide me with your Google Play Store Order Id I can get you a refund. Also you can contact me at support@tritonsw.com and I can help your troubleshoot any issues you are having. Regards. Robert

content: Absolutely incredible app! Thank you so so so much for developing this for all of us. We'd be stuck without it. I especially like the Bluetooth feature so i can hook up a device and leave it attached to my amp so I can control it through another device any time using Bluetooth. Thank you again!
Works great with my fender mustang 1 and my fender 5 head. No problems and all. Great job guys. Thank You.

Really good thinking, my question is about backwards compatibility, is remuda compatible with the new fender tone presets that have been moved from the fuse archive, after killing fuse, i mean if i download a preset from the tone community, will ot work woth the mustang 1, v2 for ex? not critical, but really curious.
replyContent: Sandu. I do not know but if you will send me a sample Tone preset via email I'll look it over and get back to you. Please email it to support@tritonsw.com  Regards. Robert

content: Great job. Please don't ever leave fender mustang amp users like fender fuse did. Btw it would be good if you guys make a video on how to use the app for its fullest potential
replyContent: I'll keep Remuda going as long as I can. You're right. I really should make a video. Perhaps this fall. Robert.

content: Useful app
Absolutely fabulous app. Brings the Mustang I to life. Simple and easy to use.
Superb. Runs perfectly with a Huawei Mediapad M5 running Android 9. Extremely well designed and very useful app. Helps you get the best out of your Mustang amp.
Really well done. Saves the day now that Fender Fuse is defunct. I'll take the phone over having to deal with a laptop any day. Thanks!
Absolutely outstanding. Fender managed to completely remove the Fuse software from the internet. I just bought a Mustang 1 and didn't know I need additional software. This app is just perfect.
Great app and great support. Highly recommended as an alternative to Fuse. I provided feedback on a small bug and it was fixed very quickly. Thanks, Robert!
The must have app if you own the old Mustang amps, well supported still buy the developer.

I have been a user for years. Love the freedom your app gives me to create. My buddy just got a new tele and unknown to me he has Mustang 1 amp. Told him of your product. Got on here today and was amazed you are still supporting this. It is bringing me joy again and now another in these emotional times. Thanks for your gift to music. I appreciate you and your solid app!
replyContent: You are welcome. I'll keep supporting as many of the original Mustang amps as I can for as long as Android maintains a stable USB Host mode. Regards.Robert

content: Hi, I'm having trouble with importing .FUSE files in to replace the standard presets, can you point me in the right direction maybe? The app itself is very good as the menu is as intuitive as the now closed fender fuse app on my computer, and is a good replacement.
replyContent:
Hi,
The help document gives full details but the basics are 1) Move preset files to your device in the MUSIC/REMUDA/PRESETS folder 2) Import them using the Import Preset command found on the sub-menu in either DIRECT or PRESET screens. Contact me at support@tritonsw.com if you'd like more details.

content: When a Mustang 3v2 came with the guitar I bought, I laughed at FUSE w/ flash requirements... then Remuda showed what a control should be for this amp and now I'm loving this amp and this app! The only negative (not really) is that Remuda allows me to get all those FUSE community presets onto my amp and I just don't have a lifetime to explore every tone!
Excellent app that allows me to configure my Fender Mustang amp. Drag and drop reordering of presets is my favorite feature
Great app to make the most of my mustang amp

The developer has recently made legitimate changes to this app that allow it to run stably and seamlessly on my Samsung Galaxy Tab SM-T580. The simple, intuitive user interface makes experimenting with the "deep edit" settings enjoyable, and encourages the user to squeeze ever last drop of performance out of the amp. This app greatly improves the utility and enjoyment of my little Fender Mustang I v2. A wonderful musical tool. THANK YOU!

Hi support, I've been away from the app for months since I purchased a Pixel XL, and couldn't get a working USB OTG cable. I tried again today, and now I'm back. I've forgotten just how necessary this app is, in order to get full value out of my Mustang v2. The Fender FUSE software has now been relagated to only downloading presets from the Fender community. Thank you!
replyContent: Thank you for your favorable comments. They are truly appreciated.

content: Working perfectly for me since the latest update (1.8.3).
replyContent:
Version 1.8.3 addresses this issue. Thanks to this owner for working with me on this fix.
Regards. Robert

content: I bought a Fender Mustang V2 second hand, a Amazon basics Lightning C to USB adapter, connected it up, and it all works fine from the go, no problems at all. Just loses a star because the look of it could be a bit sexier.
replyContent: Hi. I have made a conscious decision to forego "sexy" in favor of functional. That being said, I'll be happy to consider any design improvements you wish to suggest. Feel free to contact me at support@tritonsw.com  Regards. Robert

content: Amazing support for Fender Mustang v1 and V2 modelling amps. This is the application that Fender should have released. Thanks to third-party innovation there continues to be excellent software support for one of the best digital modeling amp values on the market.

we think after all those years we can use this modeling amp to the full. It is a shame that Fender did not release an application in the first place, when they came out with these amps. Now they brought out the LT versions with blue tooth, after GT amps with WiFi. Probably a learning curve here too.....costly

Get this app! I use it instead of FUSE for tweaking my amp presets during rehearsal. (Pixel 2 with a Floor v1 and Mustang III v2.) Developer was very responsive and helpful when I sent questions. Remuda ver 1.8.0 is working perfectly on Android 9.

Remuda has now been updated and works perfectly also on my Samsung Galaxy S8 (and 2 Lonovo tablets). I can only repeat what others have written - a super app so much more handy and intuitive than Fender Fuse. And the Performance Sets (~play lists) is a huge improvement to the whole concept of having a pre-programmed m
replyContent: The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content: easy to use
Edit: since the update the app works great hasn't crashed once!
replyContent: The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content: Great app. Also, very pleased with the customer support when I had issues. Very prompt and helpful.
it doesn't work on my Moto G6
replyContent: The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content: This is an excellent way to edit the Fender Mustang amp sounds, a real must have app to gain access to all that these amps can do without the ball ache of running fenders fuse. It should be advertised better because I came across it by accident and it's by far one of the best apps I've purchased, big thanks to the developers...

I checked out the free version first and I was immediately sold. This app makes it so easy and dare I say "enjoyable"; to change and work on my presets. I normally hate going through my amp and setting up dozens of presets all while flicking knobs and pushing buttons to go through options. Remuda makes it easy breezy. Everything is on screen and super easy to adjust or change. Whomever developed this, thank you. This app was a game changer for me. Update: the app is un usable on s7 after latest update. It freezes and crashes after making a tap.
replyContent: The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content: Keeps crashing and freezing on S7
replyContent: The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these Garth. versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content: Must have for Mustang owners. With very limited editing of effects directly on the amp, this app is fantastic to set up whatever sound you're looking for. Well worth the money for all the hard work that's gone into it.

This app is essential if you own one of the supported amps. Fender should include this with every amp as while working thru a PC is good having the ability to work thru smartphone is excellent. Keep up the good work.

Can't get it to work on Google Pixel...half the time it won't even start??? 
Brings up black screen with "Remuda" at top. When it does start, it shows 
my presents. I can usually press on a different present to change it but if 
I press anything else, it locks up....whether it's direct, performance, 
present, etc.. Weird, seems to want to work, but locks up when I try to do 
anything...frustrating!!! Update...this app rocks...tried the lite version 
on a low end android tablet that I use for Songster tabs....well it worked 
great so I repurchased the app for the tablet. It still is awful on my 
Google Pixel which is frustrating. I've tried everything. It just wants to 
lock up if you try to do anything. But again, works great on my cheap NPOLE 
tablet. It'll be my Mustang interface now. Great work!!!
replyContent: Doug. The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content: Freezes after about 30 seconds of use, every time
replyContent: The update for Android 7.x,8.x, and 9.x went live on 1/20/2019. It appears to fix all reported problems with these versions of the OS. Thanks for your patience. Robert

content:
Works great on my Samsung tablet. I used the lite version 1st for a few 
weeks and didnt have any issues so i bought it. Sometimes I think my 
presets on my Mustang V2 sound better when controlled by Remuda. I know 
that can't be, but if it sounds better im all for it

Very cool app.  Anyone that has a Fender Mustang Amp should have this on their phone or tablet.  My only complaint is that I saw a post that you can download Presets from Fender's Fuse site and use them in Remuda.  The directions said to move them from the download folder into the Remuda Preset folder.  I did that but Remuda isn't recognizing them.  If anyone has a a solution, please share it.
replyContent: Dennis. If finding the presets is still an issue, please contact me at support@tritonsw.com Regards.Robert

content:
Manage and customize all the presets on Fender Mustang 1 or 2 amplifiers. 
No computer necessary!
Worked first time, excellent. Samsung a5 2017 fender Mustang I v2

Tried out the trial first and within the hour bought the app. Great app to use with my Mustang 2 V2 amp.To anybody with a Nexus 7 having problems, flash the Rom with  lineage grouper 7.1.2 and your Nexus will work like a dream and run a lot faster. Also be careful with the OTG adapter as they can be a bit temperamental.  I am an electronics and computer repair person.

This works so well with my Mustang III v2 that I have a nexus 7 tablet now 
dedicated to the amp. I purchased this after just a short test with the 
trial version. Fantastic app for a very specific purpose.

Worked great first time, lots of fun. Fender Mustang I, Asus ZenPad 10.1 Z300M, a very inexpensive tablet, with a $5 breakout cable opening 3 USB and one charge port. Just gonna hot glue the tablet to the amp now that I know it works.
HATE IT. REFUND!4 OTG in a Rowe! Keeps disconnecting freezes up. Can't get to my fuse account,
replyContent:
Hi. I'll be glad to offer a refund if you provide me with your Play order ID. Send it to support@tritonsw.com
Robert

content: this app keep my mustang alive  üòÄ

I have to echo what others have said, this makes tweaking and shaping your sounds so easy. I was getting pissed off with having to dig it my old windows laptop to use Fuse, no longer! I too get the occasional black screen on starting the app, restarting cures that and once it's properly synced with my Mustang is a dream to use. Utterly love it.
Perfect for what I need. As a programmer excellent work.
Fabulous app, well done Triton. Exactly what I need. One recent bug to report.. sine flanger coming on by itself at random times on Asus ZenPad 8.0.
Lovely stuff....total control plus fuse presets....what's not to like 5*

Great app! Something that would be invaluable is the ability to record a sound sample and then be able to loop it in the app while applying effects to it. That way you could set up your effects without having to play it over and over on guitar.
replyContent: That is a good idea. You'd need to have a 1/8 audio cable from the Android device to the Amp for playback AND a separate direct input device from your guitar to the Device. The USB connection from the Amp is audio output only. Of course, the NEW Mustang GT series amps already have both capabilities built-in, but no help there. Robert

content: Amazing work, completely removes the barrier to editing these without a laptop. Totally worth the $.
Works perfectly. Thank you.

I originally bought this because it seemed like it would be handy for editing  my M3 v2 when there wasn't a laptop nearby but what makes it crazy powerful for me is using it's use in the studio. Now I can mic up my amp in the studio (I prefer to mic) , hookup my phone to the amp as a server and connect my 3 year old tablet in the control room for total remote control. This is huge for dialing in sounds.  This also makes me think about about buying a used M3 v2 to keep at where the band rehearses, and use my phone dump in presets for the new songs I worked on at home.   So far all seems to work good and the Bluetooth connection is working fine.  Excellent app

Downloaded the free version to test both my Nexus 10 and my LG G4. Works perfectly via both and my Mustang III v2. Purchased the full version today and took my Nexus to church where I keep the Mustang set up. I had a few preset I wanted to do some deeper editing on and Remuda made it easy as eating pie, and I still haven't read any of the help screens yet üëçüëç  Excellent little app!
Great app. First time I ever paid for a full version of anything! Too bad OTG cables and adapters are so unreliable. I wonder why?

This app is intuitive, and works as advertised with Mustang 1 and Mustang 5 using Amazon Fire 7 (2015) and Amazon Fire 8 HD tablets.  It is easier to understand than the Fender Fuse software, and unlike the OEM software, is still updated by the developer. In use, the operation is straightforward and provides all functions needed to operate the amp, save one -- TAP TEMPO.   If the developer would possibly use the Remuda logo as the "hot spot" to trigger the tap function (this would save screen space) that would be a useful addition to the app.
replyContent: Donald. Thanks for the kind comments AND the suggestion. Tap Tempo in some form is on the short list. Regards, Robert

content: This is a great app.  It's the app Fender should have made, but didn't.  Now, they don't have to because it's hard to believe they could do any better.  I especially like the client/server feature.  I now leave my amp hooked up to my HTPC all the time.  Whenever the need arises, I can quickly use Remuda on my phone without having to stop and plug in another cable.  In addition, the developer is very responsive and helpful.

I've only had this app for a couple of days, but it is outstanding.  It seems to give you access to everything you can do in Fuse, but with a cleaner, easier interface that does not require you to lug a laptop around with the amp. For the price of this and an OTG cable, it's a no brainer of a purchase for anyone using Fuse with their amp. Love it.
Developer works hard on improving this app. He was very responsive when I had a question in the past.
Developer worked hard to correct detected bugs in new version. New version looks very promissing. Great app. 5 stars folks!
replyContent: Zoran. Thank you for working with me on the Bluetooth issues. Owners like you help make Remuda better! And thanks for the suggestions. Regards, Robert

content: Way easier to use than Fuse.  A tip, I use Dropbox to get presets from my PC to Phone, then copy and move them to necessary folder. I can also keep a back up of my remuda .bak file on Dropbox and sync with other devices with remuda like my tablet.

Great app! I'm having trouble downloading presets from fender fuse using chrome on android.  I'm following the instructions of going to fender fuse site, logging in, clicking on the green download, letting page load then adding " download " after the site address. It acts like it wants too but it finally gives up and gives me an unsuccessful notice with nothing downloaded. Any help would be great. Thanks.                         Edit: thanks for the quick reply and info. Raised my rating to 5*.
replyContent: Hi. That approach was wrongly suggested by the Forum user, MusicLaw. It does NOT work under any Android browser that I have tried. The only solution is to download onto a PC and copy to the music/remuda/presets folder on your device. Regards, Robert.

content: REMUDA keeps getting better. Now with a new Amp Control Interface. Control almost everything from this new display w/ expand/collapse Amp and FX blocks. Tweaking and comparing is much improved. Compare amps w/ their parameters the same, yet FX as  their parameters were previously saved.¬†The Favorite Star Feature is terrific to quickly display selected Presets. The Three Dot (Android style menu right of the Preset selector) shows the Save function, a new icon Drag and Drop Signal Chain edit dialog, the EXP-1 Pedal dialog, a Revert Function, and more. The Settings screen lets you set this new Control screen as default when REMUDA launches. The new Amp Control screen has a Press & Hold Reset feature for each numeric value parameter. Read the Help doc for full info. Use Fender .FUSE files!! Share them easily. The Start-up Preset feature is brilliant! The Tuner works great. Easy Backup & Restore allows xfer of Presets, Song and Set Lists amongst multiple Android Devices/Mustang Amps/Friends. Full Amp Control (except Master Vol) is Fast and Easy. REMUDA does what FUSE lacks! REMUDA is a Must Have App!

I purchased a Fender Mustang 1 v2 amp after playing around with just about every other modeling amp around and was happy with the sound but hated having to bring my laptop to my practice space everytime I wanted to edit a patch. This app handles that task and more! One of the best music apps I have purchased and a must for Mustang amp owners. The only change I would like to see would be to be able to load patches right from the Fuse site.

'Great' app but when I need to edit the all important Amp Settings it keeps crashing.All other parameters seem editable.But it's the amp and cabs I want to get at the most.Waste of money since it is such a basic need.Otherwise it seems a potential great app IF the Amp edit was fixed.
replyContent:
Update: I found the bug that you encountered and it is fixed in v1.6.0. Thanks.
Hi. I'd be happy to work with you to determine what is causing your crashes. Please drop me a line at support@tritonsw.com. Thanks, Robert.

content: LOVE,,,,THIS,,,,APP!
And it keeps getting even better.

I was skeptical that this app would work! BUT! it does work and very well. I use it with my Acer A500  tablet and my Fender Mustang ii amp. The only thing I was disappointed in was that it doesn't work with my Fender Passport Mini that I use for practice.
replyContent:
Update 9/21/2016: We are not able to support the Passport Mini at this time. We do support a model called the Mustang Mini. A bit of confusion on my part. Robert.
Rolly. I'd love to get the App working with the Mini. What sort of response do you get when you connect the App to the Mini?. You can contact me at support@tritonsw.com. Regards, Robert

content: Fender should be paying you guys for this.....controls everything but the master vol......Def worth the money.... Well done

So much easier to use than FUSE, just one comment- using a v1 Mustang 1, the amp model names sometimes come up as those in v2 e.g. British 80s as 60s Thrift. Doesn't affect the modelling but is a minor irritation.
replyContent: Colin. I'm trying to track this down. I've recently discovered that the SuperSonic amp is in both V1 and V2 amps BUT it uses a different ID number in the V1. Maybe something like this is happening with the other models you cite. Thanks for the feedback.

content: Not the prettiest app but more than made up for by its functionality. Well worth the cost.
replyContent: Hi. I've got some UI improvements in the pipeline, but as you say, functionality is very important. Cheers, Robert support@tritonsw.com

content: This is really a must have for this amp..   It might not be a total replacement for the fuse software but to have the ability to control this amp with a phone is really great.   Thanks for this!
... to use .fuse presets but can you let us select the location? External storage is always a better choice for non-essential files. Thanks.

Nice alternative to FUSE.  I was going to ask for .fuse import support, but it looks like you beat me to it! You also stopped the keyboard from popping up when a preset is opened. Excellent.  One other thing: Maybe put the name of the effect on the buttons of the "pedal board" instead of generic STP, MOD, etc?  Anyway, good work!
replyContent: Joe, Thanks for the feedback. I've considered placing effect names in buttons. I too have wondered at times just what effect I had assigned to a particular category. Maybe next version.

content: Great app! An optional UI overhaul (using e.g. a skin/theme system to visually simulate gear,  a la Fuse) would be most welcome. But it can wait, as features and overall effectiveness are more important anyhow... ;-) Kudos to the developer for bringing us what Fender never did...
This really helps me out, great work and excellent support from the developer.

This app just made the Mustangs usable! Within a few minutes of installing this app and plugging it in I was able to dial in tone I had always hoped to get out my Mustangs. Blown away! I have the I, II and III v2.  Everything worked perfectly with zero setup or hassle. Actually the app started automatically when I plugged in the Mustang! Fender should pay this guy a truck load of money and buy this app and include it with the Mustangs. Well... on second thought that might mess up a great app! I hope to see a tuner soon! That would be all that is missing. Maybe if it played backing tracks from the app out the 3.5 mm audio jack. and maybe a simple visual and audible metronome? Can we get it to cook dinner while your at it? I LOVE that I can tweak so easily on one screen and just bump each parameter until i get it just right without fiddling with nobs. Just hit a note or two , let it ring and tab the screen until you get it PERFECT!  You are my hero Triton!
Very happy with this app. Just starting to figure out all it can do. Sad that Fender couldn't have done something like this themselves. But great job!

Support this development process. I don't have my Mustang any longer, and really hope the G-Dec 3 model gets the love it deserves. Got a Champion 600 and send the audio out to the Champion as a Tube modelling combo. Fantastic. Hope Remuda gets the update so I can Android my setup and leave Fuse behind.                  Please add the other Fender modeling amps. I am willing to assist QA with my G-Dec 3 Thirty. I really would like this amp to be supported also. Please I plead.
replyContent:
Update: James and I are working on this but there are major differences in the USB communication packets. I do not have a firm release date at this time.
James. Please contact me at support@tritonsw.com. I'll be happy to work with you. Robert

content: Just like I said about the free trial version. Does what it says it can do and I was pleasantly surprised by what it could do that I wasn't expecting, and even better now with more presets, etc. Works well with my Mustang amp and the Mustang Floor. Really fun for tone snobs and tweakers like myself especially while sitting on a comfy couch, beach, or wherever. I bought this App just a few days after I started using the free trial version.

Remuda offers a way to enable and tweak all settings available in Fuze from your Android device, something I asked Fender to do a long time ago. The ability to reorder presets, something that Fuse won't let you do, is worth the price alone. This software is especially useful to Mustang I and Mustang II owners, since their amps don't have front panel controls to change effects. The performance mode is useful for gigging musicians. Please add EXP-1 support soon.
I want this to work so bad. It won't recognize my Fender mustang2. What is wrong here? Help!!! Or refund, preferably help. Still no reply or refund, don't buy this App. Garbage
replyContent:
UPDATE: I have been unable to contact this individual but the offer of a refund still stands.
Charlie, Sorry I must have missed your email. Most likely your tablet does not support USB Host mode. If you send me your Play Store order number I'll be happy to issue a refund. Please send it to support@tritonsw.com. Thanks, Robert.

content: I've been using Remuda quite some time now. This product was very thought out.  The ergonomics are very good. Writing software that is both intuitive and easy to use is no easy task. Remuda accomplishes both. As with any new software development project there will always be  anomalies. For instance the IT Systems aboard the space shuttles have documtation the size of the yellow pages that document all known anomalies and defects. There is no software that is error free. The author, owner, and developer all being the same person and also a musician, known what we all want and need in this type of product. His day job is an IT Engineer working for a large company. We are all very lucky we even have such a product that runs on ANDROID devices. As I said earlier, I use the product, and it works very well. I play better, it makes my practice much more enjoyable. The product DOES NOT HAVE a steep learning curve. You can learn to use it in a day. I own 2 Fender Mustang IV V2.0 and have a tablet connected to each. If you leave  info about a defect it will be fixed. If like a feature or function tell him. Remember he is a musician. Ricky IBM IT ARCHITECT / SYSTEMS ENGINEER

I paid good money for this app and it's turning out to be a nightmare. I initially wanted it to so I could bring my Nexus 7 to the practice room and make adjustments on the fly. Unfortunately that is an impossibility because it's just too unreliable. It either crashes as soon as it opens, gives me a connection error or it won't load the presets at all. Come on man, I paid you money, work it out!
replyContent:
Will, thanks for getting in contact with me and I assume the refund came through with no problems. I'm interested to know if you have found ANY USB host mode applications that work with your device. A USB keyboard would be a good test. 
I still think there is an issue with Android version 6.0 OR the USB C type connector on the newer Nexus devices.
